# JsonPatchOperationKind enumeration

The kind of JSON patch operation.

```csharp
public enum JsonPatchOperationKind
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Add | `0` | Adds a node to the JSON. |
| Remove | `1` | Removes a node from the JSON. |
| Replace | `2` | Replaces a node in the JSON. |
